PacketDefinitions.Description: This file contains all packet definitions for packets which are sent from game client to the connect server.

Packet.Name: ConnectionInfoRequest
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the client after the user clicked on an entry of the server list.
Packet.CausedReaction: The server will send a ConnectionInfo back to the client.

Packet.Name: ConnectionInfo
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server after the client requested the connection information of a server. This happens after the user clicked on a server.
Packet.CausedReaction: The client will try to connect to the server with the specified information.

Packet.Name: ServerListRequest
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the client after it connected and received the 'Hello' message.
Packet.CausedReaction: The server will send a ServerListResponse back to the client.

Packet.Name: ServerListResponse
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server after the client requested the current server list.
Packet.CausedReaction: The client shows the available servers with their load information.

Structure.Name: ServerLoadInfo
Structure.Description: Contains the id and the load of a server.

Packet.Name: ServerListRequestOld
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the client (below season 1) after it connected and received the 'Hello' message.
Packet.CausedReaction: The server will send a ServerListResponseOld back to the client.

Packet.Name: ServerListResponseOld
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server (below season 1) after the client requested the current server list.
Packet.CausedReaction: The client shows the available servers with their load information.

Structure.Name: ServerLoadInfo
Structure.Description: Contains the id and the load of a server.

Packet.Name: Hello
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server after the client connected to the server.
Packet.CausedReaction: A game client will request the server list. The launcher would request the patch state.

Packet.Name: PatchCheckRequest
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the client (launcher) to check if the patch version is high enough to be able to connect to the server.
Packet.CausedReaction: The connect server will check the version and sends a 'PatchVersionOkay' or a 'ClientNeedsPatch' message.

Packet.Name: PatchVersionOkay
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server after the client (launcher) requested the to check the patch version and it was high enough.
Packet.CausedReaction: The launcher will activate its start button.

Packet.Name: ClientNeedsPatch
Packet.SentWhen: This packet is sent by the server after the client (launcher) requested to check the patch version and it requires an update.
Packet.CausedReaction: The launcher will download the required patches and then activate the start button.

Field.Name: PatchAddress
Field.Description: The patch address, usually to a ftp server. The address is usually "encrypted" with the 3-byte XOR key (FC CF AB).
